task.role: You are a Senior Security Engineer with expertise in authentication and secure coding. Implement Task 4 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Add security layer to verify incoming webhook authenticity using HMAC signatures
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. Create middleware/webhookAuth.ts 2. Implement HMAC-SHA256 signature verification 3. Compare computed signature with webhook header 4. Return 401 for invalid signatures 5. Add timing-safe comparison to prevent timing attacks

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-4): Implement webhook signature verification

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Test with valid and invalid signatures, verify rejection of tampered payloads
